mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (category_id, name, price, rate, stock_quantity, content) VALUES (#{sort}, #{productName}, #{price}, #{discount}, #{stock}, #{description})
mapper.select: SELECT product.id, CASE product.status WHEN 1 THEN 'sale' WHEN 2 THEN 'stop sale' WHEN 3 THEN 'sold out' WHEN 4 THEN 'deleted' END AS status, product.name, product.price, product.rate, product.created_at, product.updated_at, category.category_name FROM product product JOIN category category ON product.category_id = category.id where product.status = 1 or product.status = 2 or product.status = 3 ORDER BY product.id DESC LIMIT 10
